trans-unit.source: 这将关闭动态天气, 并减少内存占用
trans-unit.target: This will turn off the dynamic weather and reduced memory footprint
· Disaster alert and lock screen notifications

trans-unit.source: · 钉选其他城市的磁贴并自动更新
trans-unit.target: · PIN selected other cities in tile and automatically update

trans-unit.source: 做出一个还算凑合的应用, 也需要大量的精力和时间; 而且, 这个应用更新天气使用的 API 需要一些资金才能够正常工作. 如果你觉得它很棒，不妨支持一下~
trans-unit.target: Made fairly makeshift application also requires a lot of energy and time; Moreover, this application updates the weather using the API need some money in order to work properly. If you think it's great, wish to support it ~

trans-unit.source: 帮助我们, 你将解锁捐赠版的更多功能:
trans-unit.target: To help us, you will unlock the donate version of additional features:

trans-unit.source: 不超过十, 不显示十位
trans-unit.target: No more than ten, and ten digits are not displayed

trans-unit.source: 不超过十, 十位显示零
trans-unit.target: No more than ten, ten shows zero

trans-unit.source: 中国城市输入中文, 全拼, 其他输入英文
trans-unit.target: Input Chinese in Chinese cities, spelling, English

trans-unit.source: 这个 App 将为你提供更好的服务!
trans-unit.target: This App will provide you with better service!
The weather service is currently unavailable ...
